mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board order by board_no desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_title, board_arry, board_status, board_info, board_regi_ster) VALUES (#{board_title}, #{board_arry}, #{board_status}, #{board_info}, #{board_regi_ster});
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{board_title} , board_arry = #{board_arry} , board_status = #{board_status} , board_regi_ster = #{board_regi_ster} , board_info = #{board_info} WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ;
